txt.en: You flexed your arm for Foreman Indrith
Wait for Foreman Indrith to turn the wheel
Something went wrong -- you should speak with the foreman
The Water-works is a site of importance to the dwarves who wish to remain in Moria. Once such dwarf, Foreman Indrith, has made it a mission to repair the channel there.

'With the number of toads and lizards reduced, we should get a better idea of what is clogging up the works. It is going to take some time to clean out the pipes, though.

'Well, that can wait for later. I have another task that I will need your help with. Of course, I first need to see if you are strong enough to help me.

'Roll up your sleeves and let me see how much muscle you have there.'

Foreman Indrith is in the Wheel-house, beneath the Great Wheel.\n\nForeman Indrith wants to make certain that you are strong enough to assist him with turning the wheel. Perhaps you should <rgb=#FF0000>flex</rgb> for him.
'Well, I have seen greater sinews on a chicken, but you will have to do. Come along, [placeholder], let us see if we can get this wheel to move.'
Foreman Indrith is in the Wheel-house, beneath the Great Wheel.\n\nForeman Indrith has asked you to help turn the wheel.

Foreman Indrith is in the Wheel-house, beneath the Great Wheel.\n\nAfter showing the foreman that you were strong enough, of which he was dubious, the two of you attempted to turn the wheel behind him. A terrible noise was heard, and the foreman looked baffled.
'Come now, do not shy away from this. A simple <rgb=#FF0000>flex</rgb> is all I need to know if you are strong enough to help me.'
'That was not right. I think that we sheared a gear, and our work cannot continue until we have a new one. Lucky for us, I believe I know where we can find one....'
Show Foreman Indrith how strong you are by <rgb=#FF0000>flex</rgb>ing
Wait for Indrith to turn the wheel
Step to the Wheel to aid Foreman Indrith
Talk to Foreman Indrith in the Wheel-house
